O1.summary: Talk to Dr. Wanda Dorsett in the Sick Bay

description.S1: Corporal Wheeler at Groundbreaker customs asked you to update Dr. Dorsett in sick bay with the status of her shipment.

blurb.B1: She can be found at Sick Bay in the Groundbreaker

description.S1: Dr. Dorsett said that Captain Irion is most likely somewhere on Scylla.
description.S2: Go find him and make sure he is okay.

blurb.B1: the objective is to head to Scylla and rescue Captain Irion from the Outlaws there.
blurb.B2: Speak with him once they are dead,
blurb.B3: and he will update this quest

dialog.speaker: WandaDorsett (Female)
dialog.utterance: Can't say I've seen you before. I take it you're a freighter captain?

dialog.speaker: WandaDorsett (Female)
dialog.utterance: If you're here to better yourself, you'll have to wait. We're having a spot of trouble with our delivery service.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Wheeler told me to tell you to get off his ass about your shipment.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Wheeler says your shipment won't be coming in soon.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: What's going on?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: "Better myself?" Isn't this the medbay?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I'll be on my way.

dialog.speaker: WandaDorsett (Female)
dialog.utterance: Did he, now? The mouth on that man, I swear - his late mother'd be ashamed.

dialog.speaker: WandaDorsett (Female)
dialog.utterance: He must be referring to Irion. I'm sure the fool's gotten himself into another scrape.

dialog.speaker: WandaDorsett (Female)
dialog.utterance: I'm beginning to wonder if I'm ever going to get my service mechanicals at this rate.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I could try to find him.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Who's Irion?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: What do you need mechanicals for?

dialog.speaker: WandaDorsett (Female)
dialog.utterance: I'd be grateful if you'd spare the time. We need his delivery soon as yesterday.

dialog.speaker: WandaDorsett (Female)
dialog.utterance: Last he told me, he was taking a 'shortcut' by Scylla, an asteroid in the Charybdis Cluster. That's where I'd start, were I the adventuring type.

dialog.speaker: WandaDorsett (Female)
dialog.utterance: You look out, though. The place is probably crawling with outlaws.

dialog.speaker: WandaDorsett (Female)
dialog.utterance: Our delivery man.

dialog.speaker: WandaDorsett (Female)
dialog.utterance: A brave idiot with a penchant for getting himself delayed... sometimes by dates, usually by bandits.

dialog.speaker: WandaDorsett (Female)
dialog.utterance: Surgery, mostly. Medical personnel are difficult to come by on Groundbreaker.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Why's that?

dialog.speaker: WandaDorsett (Female)
dialog.utterance: The Board won't let their doctors and nurses station here, and they own all the medical schools. If we can't hire their people, we can't hire anyone.

dialog.speaker: WandaDorsett (Female)
dialog.utterance: Everyone on staff here on Groundbreaker was trained by me or Idris. We're good, don't get me wrong, but we've only two heads between us, and we don't know everything.

dialog.speaker: WandaDorsett (Female)
dialog.utterance: I'm expecting our delivery fellow to stop through with medical supplies and service automechanicals. Name's Captain Irion.

dialog.speaker: WandaDorsett (Female)
dialog.utterance: Sure is. You need a deft hand to straighten a busted nose or sparkle up those not so pearly whites, I'm your gal.

dialog.speaker: WandaDorsett (Female)
dialog.utterance: 'Course, there's not much cosmetic improvement going on at the moment, not without my mechanicals. Where the Law is Irion, anyway?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You do cosmetic surgery on this rickety space station? Really?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Whoever he is, he's not my problem.

dialog.speaker: WandaDorsett (Female)
dialog.utterance: Sure. How do you think we keep this pile of junk in the sky? It costs bits, and a little prettying up brings in a fair few of 'em.

dialog.speaker: WandaDorsett (Female)
dialog.utterance: Or it would, if I had my danged mechanicals.

dialog.speaker: WandaDorsett (Female)
dialog.utterance: You have yourself a day, then.
